item.title: Time waits for no man, or member server - The Importance of Time Synchronisation in Windows 2008 Domains
item.description: Perhaps I should put it down to it being a Friday, like the inverse of a Monday instead of lots of things breaking, things just didn't seem to be working. I had built a Windows 2008 server from a custom SOE disc, all seemed well but it wouldn’t register in DNS.Â I’d specified the name servers correctly and the server I’d built the week before had no issues registering in the same domain.
